caption.p: Number of swab tests performed on the national territory, per day. The dashed line reports official numbers from the Civil Defence agency. The other lines represent the results from applying the Hierarchical Model with intra-regional (orange column) and inter-regional (green, pink and blue lines) swab transfers. line inter-regional transfer radii considered are 100, 200 and 400Km. (For interpretation of the references to color in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the web version of this article.)
